title: Harmonie Garden
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, International, Buffet, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out, Lebanese, Syrian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Located on Wayne State University campus specializes in a variety of falafels. Very informal atmosphere for dining. Anything on menu without meat is vegan or can be made so (soy cheese available). Some vegan options are stewed green beans and okra in a tomato sauce, mujadra (spiced lentils and bulgar with caramelized onions), arabi falafel (spiced pita stuffed with falafel, drizzled with fava bean sauce) and many more. Teas, coffee and juices available. Sunday is buffet only for $9.99, and vegan items are clearly marked, with several different kinds of hummus every week, such as beet or avocado. Free Wi-Fi.
